titles.title: To extend and improve the adjustment assistance program for firms under the Trade Act of 1974.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to modify the certification criteria for firms that file for adjustment assistance. Authorizes appropriations. Extends through FY 1995 the authorization of appropriations for the adjustment assistance program.
